title: B.S. Report - Jimmy Kimmel, Stephen A. Smith, & Rachel Nichols
description: Jimmy Kimmel gives details about having President Obama on his show, Stephen A. Smith talks about the upcoming Mayweather-Pacquiao fight, and Rachel Nichols discusses her impressive career trajectory.
